name: Pillow Cover in Natural Linen with It's Beautiful Here
description:
Bring a smile to your living room!

This 100% natural unbleached linen pillow is printed with my original design in a beautiful crisp black.  It would add a fun and whimsical style to your living room, that corner chair, or even your bedroom.  The pillow cover will fit a 12 inch x 16 inch insert (available at most craft stores) or a 12 inch x 16 inch pillow you have at home that needs a little pick-me-up!

details:

12 inches x 16 inches pillow cover (insert is not included)
100% linen, natural light brown color, pre-washed, ironed
black water based ink
zipper enclosure (on bottom hem)
serged inner seams 
cotton lining inside
design is printed on ONE side of pillow 

care:

wash in cold, tumble dry and iron as needed

**NOTE:  This listing does NOT include the pillow insert.  These are bulky and expensive to ship.  Pillow inserts are available at Joann's fabric stores.  Contact me if you have any questions.

Other sizes are available.  Please contact me if you are interested and I can make a custom listing for you:

12 x 12: $22
16 x 16: $28
18 x 18: $32
20 x 20: $34

**this is a stock photo.  The pillow case you order will be made just for you, so there may be slight differences, but I promise it will be as close a match as possible.  If you have ideas about different colors or ink, fabric or would like this in a different quantity or size, please let me know!  I would love to help.**

name: cotton Kitchen Towel with Orange "life is pretty cool"
description:
Make your kitchen a happy one!! 

This unbleached all-cotton towel is hand sewn and contains a print of one of my original illustrations in a beautiful bright orange. Simple and bright and easy to care for, a fun kitchen towel makes a wonderful gift for anyone on your list.

This cotton towel is supersoft and very absorbent.  It looks good, too! 

The towel is prewashed, pre-shrunk, and hand screen printed with water based ink. It measures 19 inches x 26 inches  and is hemmed on all four sides. A loop is sewn in the upper hem for hanging. The towel and screen print soften up with each wash. I have printed the design once on the towel, at the bottom right corner.

**The item pictured here is a stock photo. The item you order will be made just for you...so there could be minor differences...that is the beauty of handmade! I promise it will be fantastic. I create the items as ordered and can ship them out within just a few days. If you have any questions or are interested in a different color or quantity, please send me a message...I'm happy to help! 

Care Instructions:

Wash in warm or cold water
Tumble dry or hang dry
Use a dry iron over the design or iron on the reverse side with steam.

name: Linen Cafe Apron with Bicycle
description:
Linen Apron with Bicycle Screenprint

Here's a fun, quirky, colorful, and whimsical apron for the kitchen or the craft show!

As with all of my products, I try to create something that I would want and wear myself, and I love how this turned out!   This would be great in the kitchen, around the house, or at the craft show.

details:

turquoise, grass green, and natural linen
chocolate brown ink for bicycle screenprint
straps: 30  inches long
two darts at the top of the apron
pocket: 9 inches square
apron dimensions: 14 x 28 inches

care:

machine wash in cold or warm, tumble dry, iron as needed.

name: Cotton Kitchen Towel with Denim Blue Surfboards
description:
Make your kitchen a happy one!  

This unbleached all-cotton  towel is hand sewn and hand screenprinted with one of my original illustrations in beautiful deep indigo blue... a great denim blue color so dark it's almost black. This cotton towel is super soft and very absorbent...it's a great colorful addition to any home.  Wonderful as a gift, too!

details:

prewashed natural unbleached cotton
hand sewn, hand printed
19 inches x 26 inches
hanging loop sewn into top hem
denim blue waterbased ink 

care:

Wash in warm or cold water
Tumble dry or hang dry
Use a dry iron over the design or iron on the reverse side with steam.

**The item pictured here is a stock photo.  The item you order will be made just for you...so there could be minor differences...that is the beauty of handmade! I promise it will be fantastic.  I create the towels as ordered and can ship them out within just a few days.  If you have any questions or are interested in a different color or quantity, please send me a message...I'm happy to help!

name: Linen Pillow cover with Tandem Bicycle
description:
12 x 16 inch Linen pillow cover with magenta tandem bicycle design.

Bring a smile to your living room!  Add this whimsical accessory and make your couch happy!

This pillow cover is printed with my original design in hot pink fuschia ink on crisp white linen.  It would add a fun and whimsical style to your living room, that corner chair, or even your bedroom.  The pillow cover will fit a 12 inch x 16 inch insert (available at most craft stores) or a 12 inch x 16 inch pillow you have at home that needs a little pick-me-up!

details:

12 inches x 16 inches pillow cover (insert is not included)
100% linen, white, pre-washed, ironed
dark pink water based ink
zipper enclosure (on bottom hem)
serged inner seams 
design is printed on ONE side of pillow 
sweetnature designs logo on back side

care:

spot clean for best results
can wash in cold, tumble dry and iron as needed

**NOTE:  This listing does NOT include the pillow insert.  These are bulky and expensive to ship.  Pillow inserts are available at Joann's fabric stores.  Contact me if you have any questions.

**this is a stock photo.  The pillow case you order will be made just for you, so there may be slight differences, but I promise it will be as close a match as possible.  If you have ideas about different colors or ink, fabric or would like this in a different quantity or size, please let me know!  I would love to help.**

Thanks for taking a look!
